channel.title: Help With Making New Shops [317]
channel.description:
I used this tut but it didnt work :( http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html
Everytime i try to make a shop it works but when i Right-Click and click trade then it DC's me for some reason can someone help me? BTW if it matters i am using Allstar-Scape V2 Source
If possible can someone teamveiw me For id and pass PM Me
